positive.title: Solana-Based Cypher Protocol Experiences Exploit, Freezes Smart Contract
positive.description: The protocol’s contracts are now frozen as contributors attempt to make contact with hackers to negotiate a return of funds.

positive.title: PayPal’s Regulated Stablecoin Is a ‘Watershed Moment’ in Crypto Space, Says Partner Paxos
positive.description: “The difference is significant because we have a prudential regulator,” said Paxos head of strategy Walter Hessert.

positive.title: Crypto News Today: PayPal's Stablecoin Debut, Worldcoin's Kenyan Hurdles, and More
positive.description: From PayPal's entry into the stablecoin market to regulatory challenges faced by Worldcoin in Kenya, the crypto world continues to be a blend of innovation and controversy.

positive.title: Zoom updates terms after backlash, won’t train AI without consent
positive.description: Many online said they were halting the use of Zoom over terms that seemingly allowed the platform to scrape user data to train AI models.

positive.title: Cypher Protocol freezes smart contract after an estimated $1M exploit
positive.description: A crypto wallet suspected to be tied to the exploit has gained over $1 million in SOL and UDSC since the attack.

positive.title: Bitcoin funds see weekly outflows of $111M, most since March: CoinShares
positive.description: Solana bucked the trend, with its $9.5 million in inflows taking the top spot over the past week.

positive.title: Worldcoin expects more companies to integrate in the coming months, says product head
positive.description: The head of product at Tools for Humanity told Cointelegraph that Worldcoin is expecting more companies to integrate in the second half of the year.

positive.title: First Mover Asia: First $30K, Then $40K, but Bitcoin Needs Volatility First
positive.description: The world’s largest digital asset is rangebound, but so far this year, bitcoin is beating the returns most digital asset funds are posting.

positive.title: Crypto News Today: Bitcoin's Rally Toward $30K, PayPal's Stablecoin Fakes, and More
positive.description: As Bitcoin retakes $30K and major players like PayPal delve into the crypto realm, the intersection of traditional finance and crypto becomes more pronounced.

positive.title: Fed Starts New Program to Oversee Crypto Activity in U.S. Banks
positive.description: The U.S. Federal Reserve is starting a new program for overseeing banks’ crypto activity, and it further clarified its requirement that the lenders under its authority get approval before engaging in digital assets activities.

positive.title: BlackRock insiders say Bitcoin ETF is likely 6 months away: Novogratz
positive.description: “We’re going to fight like cats and dogs to win market share” once spot Bitcoin ETFs are approved, Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz told shareholders.

positive.title: US Fed steps up oversight of banks' involvement with crypto firms
positive.description: The limitations set out in the Federal Reserve’s new Program provides additional measures to its original policy statement laid out in January.

positive.title: ChatGPT and Claude are ‘becoming capable of tackling real-world missions,’ say scientists
positive.description: The scientists developed a tool called "AgentBench" to benchmark LLM models as agents.

positive.title: How self-sovereign identity helps users own their data
positive.description: Shiba Inu lead developer Shytoshi Kusama recently unveiled plans to integrate self-sovereign identity into its projects.

negative.title: Congress, Not the SEC, Should Set U.S. Digital Asset Policy
Binance's VC Arm Dominated Funding Rounds Last Week Even as Regulators Scrutinized the Crypto Exchange
negative.description: Binance Labs announced investments in four incubator projects and participated in a round for privacy infrastructure startup zkPass.

negative.title: Sino Global Files $67M Claim Against FTX-Alameda
negative.description: Sino Global invested in tokens heavily affected by the decline of Sam Bankman-Fried's FTX crypto empire and partnered with FTX on a fund raised with outside investors' capital.

negative.title: PayPal stablecoin launch sparks wave of fake PYUSD tokens
negative.description: Nearly 30 fake PYUSD tokens cropped up in the wake of PayPal’s most recent announcement.

negative.title: PayPal USD: Boon for Ethereum but not decentralization, says community
negative.description: Proponents say PayPal’s PYUSD could see Ethereum become the money layer of the internet, while opponents argue that it’ll act like a poorly designed central bank digital currency.

negative.title: China’s risky Bitcoin court decision, is Huobi in trouble or not? Asia Express
negative.description: Man loses $10M after Chinese court rules Bitcoin lending is not protected by law, loads of Web3 founders get arrested, and Huobi rumors swirl.

negative.title: Buffett and Ackman take opposing sides on Treasury yields — What does it mean for Bitcoin?
negative.description: Two investment moguls are betting on different directions for inflation and Treasury yields, with potentially negative impacts on Bitcoin.

negative.title: Coinbase Exec: ‘There’s No Playbook’ for Public Company Launching Blockchain
negative.description: As Coinbase, the big U.S. crypto exchange, plans to launch its new Base blockchain on Wednesday, CoinDesk interviewed Jesse Pollak, who’s leading the effort. Here’s an excerpted version.

negative.title: Venture-Backed Saddle Finance Proposes Wind-Down, Dissolution
negative.description: The Ethereum-based crypto trading protocol will shut down and distribute its treasury to investors.

negative.title: Desperately Seeking Crypto’s Killer App
negative.description: When you take away the speculation, what Web3 services actually deliver utility for users?

negative.title: Core Scientific’s bankruptcy plan includes equity stake for Bitmain and Anchorage
negative.description: If the plan is approved, Core Scientific could buy 27,000 Bitmain miners for roughly $23 million in cash and $54 million in company equity.

negative.title: Bitstamp to suspend trading of major altcoins for US users
negative.description: All the soon-to-be-suspended tokens are alleged by the SEC to be securities in its lawsuit against Coinbase and Binance.

negative.title: Former FTX exec Ryan Salame and US prosecutors are discussing a plea deal: Report
negative.description: It’s unclear whether any reported guilty plea from Ryan Salame would have the former FTX Digital Markets co-CEO testify at Sam Bankman-Fried's trial in October.
